example: The red car is parked in front of the blue house.
ground_truth: Das rote Auto parkt vor dem blauen Haus.

example: She enjoys reading books in the park on sunny afternoons.
ground_truth: Sie liest gerne an sonnigen Nachmittagen Bücher im Park.
